privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Helixio ("we") is committed to protecting user privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide when registering (name, email, password), service usage data, and payment information through Midtrans. We do not store credit card data directly.

sections.title: 2. Use of Information
sections.content: Your information is used to provide and improve services, process payments, send account-related notifications, and communicate about product updates.

sections.title: 3. Data Security
sections.content: We use end-to-end encryption, secure cookies, and industry security standards to protect your data. Access to data is restricted to personnel who need it.

sections.title: 4. Data Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell your personal data. Data is only shared with third-party service providers necessary for operations (such as Midtrans for payments) and bound by confidentiality agreements.

sections.title: 5. User Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal data at any time through account settings or by contacting our support team.

sections.title: 6. Contact Us
sections.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at support@helixio.app.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using Helixio services, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read carefully before using our platform.

sections.title: 1. Use of Service
sections.content: Helixio provides a productivity platform including notes, kanban board, calendar, and AI assistant. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password.

sections.title: 2. Account and Registration
sections.content: You must provide accurate information when registering. Each person is only allowed one account. We reserve the right to suspend accounts that violate these terms.

sections.title: 3. Subscription and Payment
sections.content: Payments are processed through Midtrans. Subscriptions are valid for the selected period. Upgrades take effect immediately, downgrades apply in the next period. Cancellation is available at any time.

sections.title: 4. User Content
sections.content: You retain ownership of all content you create on Helixio. We do not claim ownership over your notes, tasks, or data.

sections.title: 5. Usage Restrictions
sections.content: You may not use the service for illegal activities, distribute malware, or disrupt the service. Violations may result in account suspension.

sections.title: 6. Changes to Terms
sections.content: We may update these terms and conditions from time to time. Significant changes will be notified via email or in-app notification.
